ActorTalk: Commandant? I didn't expect you to be here so soon.
Have you been waiting long, Lucia?
Anywhere you'd like to check out today?
Not really, I just got here too. So... what's the plan for today, Commandant?
The WGAA gave me some exhibition tickets. Want to go together?
Looks like we're on the same wavelength. Last time I passed by, I was thinking of inviting you to that same exhibition.
The exhibit's theme is... ancient murals and the digital reconstruction of surface cities.
Let's head out now. After the exhibition, I'd love to try the new dishes at Kowloong Restaurant with you, Commandant.
I heard Stella Brew launched a new electrolyte drink for Constructs. I'm thinking of giving it a try. What about you, Commandant? Any drink you'd like?
Sounds good. I remember Stella Brew also has a wellness drink that's great. Since you're always so busy, why not go there for a drink and relax?
Heading out, Commandant? If anything happens, make sure to contact me.
